name: Flag Game (seniorgameproject)
description:
You've successfully stolen the flag from the Red/Green Team, now brawl your way across three levels of classic rage-game madness to win! Memorization is key, and failure is almost guaranteed!

The zip file includes the 64-bit Windows and Linux executable files.

Controls: Tab to shoot. Arrow Keys to run/jump. Dying resets you to the beginning of the level. You have one hit point, so be careful!

Made as a school project.
